subject: Pro x pedals
description_text:
Good morning,

I got my rig together and the 3 pedals are not working.

Shows up in windows controllers as simsonn but when I use the simsonn
manager software it shows disconnected.

Also shows an error under usb devices.

I just want to race!

conversations.body_text: Hi Greg McHargue,     Please download the latest version of the software and try manually updating the firmware. If you encounter any USB errors, please take a screenshot and send it to us for review. We recommend connecting the device to the rear USB 3.0 (blue) port of your computer, or using a powered USB device, as the issue is likely caused by insufficient power supply. You may also try updating the firmware again to ensure proper functionality.      Please go to Settings → Update → Check for Updates to perform the update. Once the update is complete, please unplug and reconnect the USB.   https://drive.google.com/file/d/1mS9dS2GyzhRYo81BcmTIOXY1POa6RvST/view?usp=drive_link

The latest software is installed. I also updated firmware.

Pedals show connected in simsonn manager now and I can change the leds,
however there is still no pedal response on the simsonn app.

If I use diview I can see the pedals working but cannot calibrate correctly.

Is there a factory settings profile I can upload?

On Tue, Sep 2, 2025, 11:30 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi Greg McHargue,  Please unplug and reconnect the USB, then use the Offset button in the software to adjust the initial position of the pedal. After that, run a test. If the issue persists, please install Todesk, and I can check it for you via remote support.      Could you please install the Todesk tool now? I happen to be available and can remotely check and update your device for you. Todesk does not require registration — if you see a registration prompt, simply click the “X” in the top-right corner to close it. Once installed, please provide me with the ID and temporary code, and I will be able to assist you remotely.      https://dl.todesk.com/windows/ToDesk_Setup.exe

Issue persists. I have installed todesk and hopefully available this
evening.

On Tue, Sep 2, 2025 at 11:36 PM service@simsonn.com

你好，Greg McHargue，     Please uninstall the current SIMSONN Manager from your computer, then download and install SIMSONN Manager version 2.1.1.  Next, go to Settings → Update to update the firmware, and test the device again after the update is complete.  If the issue persists, please let me know your local time and city, as well as when you are available for remote assistance, and I will work with you to resolve the problem.   https://drive.google.com/file/d/1mS9dS2GyzhRYo81BcmTIOXY1POa6RvST/view?usp=drive_link

Problem still persists. Can adjust color but no movement axis on manager no
matter what I try.

I am in Texas, central time 78610.

Can make myself available in the evenings


On Wed, Sep 3, 2025, 11:35 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi Greg McHargue,  Please take a screenshot of the pedal connection interface in SIMSONN Manager 2.1.1, so I can check your version and help you identify the issue.
